name: NSPersistentHistoryTransaction
desc: A set of changes in the persistent history based on a context save or batch operation.

items.name: func objectIDNotification() -> Notification
items.desc: Obtains a notification for use in merging the transaction’s changes into a managed object context.

items.name: class var fetchRequest: NSFetchRequest<NSFetchRequestResult>?
items.desc: A fetch request that has the persistent history transaction as the entity.

items.name: class var entityDescription: NSEntityDescription?
items.desc: The entity description of the persistent history transaction entity.

items.name: class func entityDescription(with: NSManagedObjectContext) -> NSEntityDescription?
items.desc: Requests an entity description using the provided context for the managed object type affected by the transaction.

items.name: var author: String?
items.desc: A granular description of the context that made the persistent history change, if available.

items.name: var changes: [NSPersistentHistoryChange]?
items.desc: The array of persistent history changes.

items.name: var timestamp: Date
items.desc: The date of the persistent history change.

items.name: var token: NSPersistentHistoryToken
items.desc: The token that represents this transaction in the persistent history.
